full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @571B BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SH'AKYA SE NA DANG DZNY'A NA SID DHI DANG ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BAN DE DHARMA T'A SH'I LA LA SOGS PAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB, SLAD KYI DBANG PHYUG DAM PA'I MNGA' BDAG BOD KYI DPAL LHA BTZAN PO BKRA SHIS LHA SDE BTZAN GYI BKAS, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU BH'A shI TA DANG, SGRA BSGYUR GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS 'GREL PA DANG MTHUN PAR BSGYUR, SLAD KYI RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN @0572A *, ,PO PAndI TA CHEN PO D'I PAm KA RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS YUL DBUS KYI 'GREL PA DANG GTUGS NAS BCOS SHING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB, YANG SLAD KYES KYI SMAD GNYE THANG NA MO CHER, PAntI TA CHEN PO D'I PAm KA RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, LO TZTSA BA 'BROM RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS GNYIS KYIS BRGYAD STONG PA BSHAD PA'I DUS SU CHE LONG ZHIG GTAN LA PHAB, PHYI SAR SGRENG GTZUG LAG KHANG DU LO TZTSA BA 'BROM RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MDO GSUM DANG GTUGS NAS LAN GNYIS GTAN LA PHAB, SLAD KYIS YANG LO TZTSA BA DE NYID KYI BSHAD PA MDZAD CING PHRAN TSEGS KYANG GTAN LA PHAB, ,DUS PHYIS LO TZTSA BA CHEN PO SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS KHA CHE'I DPE DANG YUL DBUS KYI DPE DU MA BSAGS NAS GTAN LA PHAB, ,
